15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <inttypes.h>
20
21#include <isc/buffer.h>
22#include <isc/string.h> /* Required for HP/UX (and others?) */
23#include <isc/mem.h>
24
25#include <isccfg/cfg.h>
26
27#include <dns/fixedname.h>
28#include <dns/keyvalues.h>
29#include <dns/name.h>
30#include <dns/tkey.h>
31
32#include <dst/gssapi.h>
33
34#include <named/tkeyconf.h>
35
36#define RETERR(x) do { \
37 result = (x); \
38 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) \
39 goto failure; \
40 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
41
42#include<named/log.h>
43#define LOG(msg) \
44 isc_log_write(named_g_lctx, \
45 NAMED_LOGCATEGORY_GENERAL, \
46 NAMED_LOGMODULE_SERVER, \
47 ISC_LOG_ERROR, \
48 "%s", msg)
49
50isc_result_t
51named_tkeyctx_fromconfig(const cfg_obj_t *options, isc_mem_t *mctx,
52 dns_tkeyctx_t **tctxp)
53{
54 isc_result_t result;
55 dns_tkeyctx_t *tctx = NULL;
56 const char *s;
57 uint32_t n;
58 dns_fixedname_t fname;
59 dns_name_t *name;
60 isc_buffer_t b;
61 const cfg_obj_t *obj;
62 int type;
63
64 result = dns_tkeyctx_create(mctx, &tctx);
65 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
66 return (result);
67
68 obj = NULL;
69 result = cfg_map_get(options, "tkey-dhkey", &obj);
70 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
71 s = cfg_obj_asstring(cfg_tuple_get(obj, "name"));
72 n = cfg_obj_asuint32(cfg_tuple_get(obj, "keyid"));
73 isc_buffer_constinit(&b, s, strlen(s));
74 isc_buffer_add(&b, strlen(s));
75 name = dns_fixedname_initname(&fname);
76 RETERR(dns_name_fromtext(name, &b, dns_rootname, 0, NULL));
77 type = DST_TYPE_PUBLIC|DST_TYPE_PRIVATE|DST_TYPE_KEY;
78 RETERR(dst_key_fromfile(name, (dns_keytag_t) n, DNS_KEYALG_DH,
79 type, NULL, mctx, &tctx->dhkey));
80 }
81
82 obj = NULL;
83 result = cfg_map_get(options, "tkey-domain", &obj);
84 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
85 s = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
86 isc_buffer_constinit(&b, s, strlen(s));
87 isc_buffer_add(&b, strlen(s));
88 name = dns_fixedname_initname(&fname);
89 RETERR(dns_name_fromtext(name, &b, dns_rootname, 0, NULL));
90 tctx->domain = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(dns_name_t));
91 if (tctx->domain == NULL) {
92 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
93 goto failure;
94 }
95 dns_name_init(tctx->domain, NULL);
96 RETERR(dns_name_dup(name, mctx, tctx->domain));
97 }
98
99 obj = NULL;
100 result = cfg_map_get(options, "tkey-gssapi-credential", &obj);
101 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
102 s = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
103
104 isc_buffer_constinit(&b, s, strlen(s));
105 isc_buffer_add(&b, strlen(s));
106 name = dns_fixedname_initname(&fname);
107 RETERR(dns_name_fromtext(name, &b, dns_rootname, 0, NULL));
108 RETERR(dst_gssapi_acquirecred(name, false, &tctx->gsscred));
109 }
110
111 obj = NULL;
112 result = cfg_map_get(options, "tkey-gssapi-keytab", &obj);
113 if (result == ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
114 s = cfg_obj_asstring(obj);
115 tctx->gssapi_keytab = isc_mem_strdup(mctx, s);
116 if (tctx->gssapi_keytab == NULL) {
117 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
118 goto failure;
119 }
120 }
121
122 *tctxp = tctx;
123 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
124
125 failure:
126 dns_tkeyctx_destroy(&tctx);
127 return (result);
128}
129
